description:
Ashibe-kun has given all the food in the fridge to Goma-chan. 
He even gave Goma-chan the canned crab which was a gift!
How should they keep feeding Goma-chan? 
That’s right! They can go ask help to Grandpa who owns a large company!
Ashibe-kun makes friends with Grandpa’s secretary, Peppeppe-san, but she has left.
Is it because of the request Ashibe-kun has made to Grandpa? 
Where did you go, Peppeppe-san?! 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ペッペッぺッさんのゆううつ
